start k8s dashboard: kubectl -n kubernetes-dashboard port-forward svc/kubernetes-dashboard-kong-proxy 8443:443
access to k8s dashboard: https://localhost:8443/

apply yml file: example
	D:\project\k8s>kubectl apply -f dashboard-adminuser.yaml
	serviceaccount/admin-user created

	D:\project\k8s>kubectl apply -f dashboard-rolebinding.yaml
	clusterrolebinding.rbac.authorization.k8s.io/admin-user created

get replica: kubectl get replicaset
get pods: kubectl get pods
delete pod: kubectl delete pod <pod-name>
get event: kubectl get events --sort-by='.metadata.creationTimestamp'
scale deployment using cli: kubectl scale deployment <deployment-name> --replicas=<number-of-replicas>
 Ex: kubectl scale deployment accounts-deployment --replicas=1
describe pod: kubectl describe pod <pod-name>
setimage: kubectl set image deployment <deployment-name> <container-name>=<new-image>
 Ex: kubectl set image deployment accounts-deployment accounts-container=tientran1504/accounts:v2
rollout history: kubectl rollout history deployment <deployment-name>
 Ex: kubectl rollout history deployment accounts-deployment
rollback: kubectl rollout undo deployment <deployment-name> --to-revision=<revision-number>
 Ex: kubectl rollout undo deployment accounts-deployment --to-revision=2
get services: kubectl get services
delete file: kubectl delete -f <file-name>.yaml
 Ex: kubectl delete -f dashboard-adminuser.yaml
